Class BuildingsArray

        private int compare​(Building x,

        Parameters:
        x - takes a Building
        y - takes a Building
        Returns:
        returns true if x < y returns -1 , x==y returns 0, x > y retunrs 1

      • get

        public Building get​(int index)
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getById

        public Building getById​(int id)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
